channel.description: Recent content in websockets on Home

item.title: Mud Harbour: An Experiment in Websockets and Java Web Frameworks
item.description: Well I spent some time put a web front end to some java code I made a long time ago for a MUD The project is a decent example of Jersey, SocialAuth and WebSockets with some other nifty things (taken from other frameworks - like flash messages).
